name: LudumDare51 (Daniel Kennedy)
description:
** NB Be Warned audio very loud! Fixed Minor audio bug fix where audio playing at 300 percent

Keeping moving up! Escape the ice and be careful. Every 10 seconds the world will change! 

If you get stuck, press control! It may save you.
